33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn 'Umar narrated that the Prophet(s.a.w) was asked about the Dajjal, so he said:"Lo! Indeed your Lord is not blind in one eye, and indeed he is blind in one eye; his right eye is as if it is a floating grape

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صِفَةِ الدَّجَّالِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Description Of The Dajjal
